about.details:
Incorporated in 2006, Pramara Promotions Limited is a promotional marketing agency. The company is engaged in the business of ideation, conceptualization, designing manufacturing and marketing of promotional products and gift items for clients across sectors, such as FMCG, QSR, pharma, beverage companies non-alcoholic and alcoholic, cosmetic, telecom, media and others.

The company offers services such as Cross Promotions, Loyalty and rewards, Corporate Gifting, Toy Retail, Sweepstakes promotions and more. The company also manufacture the products under an OEM arrangement, where& the company manufactures products such as water bottles, pens, etc. which are branded with the company's logo or design and used as promotional merchandise.

Pramara has designed and manufactured around 5000 products. The company has also expanded its product offerings by launching the brands "Toyworks" and;"Tribeyoung".

Pramara undertake a part of the manufacturing activities through its third-party manufacturing partner. As of July 31, 2023, the company's overall staff strength is 83 employees.

Competitive Strength:
  • Established track record.
  • Strong product designing and development capabilities backed by technical expertise.
  • Cost-efficient operating structure.
  • Experienced Promoter and Management team.
  • Established strong relationships with our customers.
  • High-quality control and production standards.

faqs.question: What is the Pramara Promotions IPO?
faqs.answer:
Pramara Promotions IPO is a SME IPO of 2424000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹15.27 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹63 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on September 1, 2023, and closes on September 5, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Pramara Promotions IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Pramara Promotions IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Pramara Promotions IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Pramara Promotions IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Pramara Promotions IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Pramara Promotions IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Pramara Promotions IPO opens on September 1, 2023 and closes on September 5, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Pramara Promotions IPO?
faqs.answer: Pramara Promotions IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,26,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Pramara Promotions IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Pramara Promotions IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Pramara Promotions IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Pramara Promotions IPO will be done on Friday, September 8, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, September 12, 2023. Check the Pramara Promotions IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Pramara Promotions IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Pramara Promotions IPO listing date is on Wednesday, September 13, 2023.
